## Summary
Mitsubishi Electric Corporation is a Japanese multinational electronics and electrical equipment manufacturing company and one of the world's leading providers of industrial automation and control systems. The company's Factory Automation division offers a comprehensive range of products including programmable logic controllers (PLCs), human-machine interfaces (HMIs), servo systems, and industrial robots. Mitsubishi Electric's MELSEC (Mitsubishi Electric Logic Sequence Controller) series of PLCs is widely used in industrial automation applications worldwide. The company's iQ-R and iQ-F series PLCs represent the latest generation of high-performance, modular automation systems with advanced features for complex industrial applications.

## Key Information
- **Company**: Mitsubishi Electric Corporation
- **Founded**: 1921
- **Headquarters**: Tokyo, Japan
- **Market Position**: Global leader in industrial automation and control systems
- **Revenue**: ¥4.8 trillion (2023)
- **Employees**: 138,000+ worldwide
- **Products**: MELSEC PLCs, GOT HMIs, MELSERVO servo systems, MELFA industrial robots

## Technical Details
### Product Portfolio

#### 1. Control Systems
**MELSEC iQ-R Series**
- **Models**: QCPU, QCPU-S, QCPU-S1, QCPU-S3, QCPU-S8
- **Performance**: 0.009ms to 0.034ms per instruction (depending on model)
- **Memory**: 16MB to 64MB program memory, 32MB to 128MB data memory
- **I/O Capacity**: Up to 98,304 I/O points (depending on system architecture)
- **Communication**: Ethernet, CC-Link IE Field, CC-Link, Modbus TCP/IP
- **Applications**: High-speed control, complex automation, motion control
- **Features**: Multi-core processor, high-speed communication, advanced motion control

**MELSEC iQ-F Series**
- **Models**: FX3U-32MT/ES-A, FX3U-48MT/ES-A, FX3U-64MT/ES-A, FX3U-80MT/ES-A
- **Performance**: 0.08ms to 0.24ms per instruction (depending on model)
- **Memory**: 64KB to 256KB program memory, 256KB to 1MB data memory
- **I/O Capacity**: Up to 4,096 I/O points (depending on system architecture)
- **Communication**: Ethernet, RS232, RS485, USB
- **Applications**: Medium automation, machine control, building automation
- **Features**: Compact design, cost-effective, easy to use

**MELSEC Q Series**
- **Models**: Q02CPU, Q06CPU, Q12CPU, Q25CPU, Q02HCPU, Q06HCPU
- **Performance**: 0.024ms to 0.34ms per instruction (depending on model)
- **Memory**: 256KB to 2MB program memory, 1MB to 8MB data memory
- **I/O Capacity**: Up to 8,192 I/O points (depending on system architecture)
- **Communication**: Ethernet, CC-Link, Modbus TCP/IP, RS232/485
- **Applications**: Complex automation, process control, motion control
- **Features**: Modular design, high performance, scalability

**MELSEC L Series**
- **Models**: L26CPU, L26CPU-BT, L26CPU-PNT, L26CPU-MT
- **Performance**: 0.08ms to 0.24ms per instruction (depending on model)
- **Memory**: 64KB to 256KB program memory, 256KB to 1MB data memory
- **I/O Capacity**: Up to 4,096 I/O points (depending on system architecture)
- **Communication**: Ethernet, CC-Link, Modbus TCP/IP, RS232/485
- **Applications**: Medium automation, machine control, building automation
- **Features**: Compact design, cost-effective, easy to use

**MELSEC FX Series**
- **Models**: FX3U-32MT/ES-A, FX3U-48MT/ES-A, FX3U-64MT/ES-A, FX3U-80MT/ES-A
- **Performance**: 0.08ms to 0.24ms per instruction (depending on model)
- **Memory**: 64KB to 256KB program memory, 256KB to 1MB data memory
- **I/O Capacity**: Up to 256 I/O points (depending on system architecture)
- **Communication**: RS232, RS485, USB
- **Applications**: Small automation, machine control, building automation
- **Features**: Compact design, cost-effective, easy to use

#### 2. Human-Machine Interfaces (HMI)
**GOT Series**
- **Models**: GOT2000, GOT1000, GOT Simple
- **Screen Sizes**: 3.5" to 15" (depending on model)
- **Resolution**: 320x240 to 1280x800 (depending on model)
- **Communication**: Ethernet, USB, RS232/485
- **Applications**: Human-machine interface, supervisory control
- **Features**: Touch screen, color display, high resolution

**GOT2000 Series**
- **Models**: GT27, GT25, GT23, GT21, GT16, GT15, GT12, GT11
- **Screen Sizes**: 10.4" to 15" (depending on model)
- **Resolution**: 800x600 to 1280x800 (depending on model)
- **Communication**: Ethernet, USB, RS232/485
- **Applications**: Advanced HMI, supervisory control, data visualization
- **Features**: High resolution, color display, advanced graphics

**GOT1000 Series**
- **Models**: GT15, GT12, GT11, GT10, GT09, GT07, GT05
- **Screen Sizes**: 5.7" to 15" (depending on model)
- **Resolution**: 320x240 to 800x600 (depending on model)
- **Communication**: Ethernet, USB, RS232/485
- **Applications**: Standard HMI, supervisory control, data visualization
- **Features**: Color display, touch screen, standard graphics

**GOT Simple Series**
- **Models**: GT21, GT16, GT15, GT12, GT11
- **Screen Sizes**: 5.7" to 15" (depending on model)
- **Resolution**: 320x240 to 800x600 (depending on model)
- **Communication**: Ethernet, USB, RS232/485
- **Applications**: Simple HMI, basic control, data visualization
- **Features**: Simple interface, basic graphics, cost-effective

#### 3. Motion Control Systems
**MELSERVO Servo Systems**
- **Models**: MR-JE, MR-JE-B, MR-J4, MR-JE-A, MR-JE-BA
- **Power Range**: 100W to 55kW
- **Voltage**: 200V, 400V
- **Features**: High performance, precision control, advanced algorithms
- **Communication**: Ethernet, CC-Link, Modbus TCP/IP
- **Applications**: Motion control, positioning control, speed control
- **Standards**: IEC 61800-5-1, IEC 61800-5-2

**MELFA Industrial Robots**
- **Models**: RV-F, RV-7F, RV-5F, RV-4F, RV-3F
- **Payload**: 0.5kg to 20kg (depending on model)
- **Reach**: 350mm to 1,300mm (depending on model)
- **Repeatability**: ±0.01mm to ±0.02mm (depending on model)
- **Applications**: Assembly, material handling, machine tending
- **Features**: High precision, compact design, advanced control

**Motion Control Software**
- **Function**: Motion control programming and configuration
- **Software**: Mitsubishi Motion Works, GOT Designer
- **Features**: Graphical programming, simulation, optimization
- **Communication**: Ethernet, CC-Link, Modbus TCP/IP
- **Applications**: Motion control, positioning control, speed control
- **Standards**: IEC 61800-5-1, IEC 61800-5-2

#### 4. Industrial Components
**I/O Modules**
- **Types**: Digital input, digital output, analog input, analog output, special I/O
- **Current Range**: 0.1A to 10A
- **Voltage**: 24V DC, 100-240V AC
- **Features**: High reliability, long life, compact design
- **Applications**: Industrial switching, control systems
- **Communication**: Ethernet, CC-Link, Modbus TCP/IP

**Power Supplies**
- **Types**: MELSEC power supplies, Q power supplies, L power supplies
- **Power Range**: 5W to 10,000W
- **Voltage**: 24V DC, 100-240V AC
- **Features**: High reliability, long life, compact design
- **Applications**: Industrial power supply, backup power
- **Standards**: UL, CE, CSA, IEC

**Industrial Switches**
- **Types**: CC-Link IE Field switches, Ethernet switches, fiber switches
- **Ports**: 4 to 52 ports
- **Speed**: 10/100/1000 Mbps, 10 Gbps
- **Features**: High reliability, long life, compact design
- **Applications**: Industrial networking, communication systems
- **Standards**: UL, CE, CSA, IEC

**Safety Components**
- **Types**: Safety relays, safety PLCs, safety I/O modules, safety controllers
- **Categories**: Category 2, Category 3, Category 4 (EN ISO 13849-1)
- **Performance**: PL d, PL e, SIL 2, SIL 3 (IEC 62061)
- **Features**: High reliability, redundant design, diagnostic capability
- **Applications**: Safety systems, machine safety, process safety
- **Standards**: IEC 61508, IEC 62061, EN ISO 13849-1

### Integration Capabilities

#### 1. System Integration
**HMI Integration**
- **Protocols**: Ethernet, CC-Link, Modbus TCP/IP
- **Features**: Data exchange, visualization, alarm management
- **Integration**: GOT HMIs, third-party HMIs
- **Applications**: Human-machine interface, supervisory control
- **Standards**: OPC UA, CC-Link standards

**SCADA Integration**
- **Protocols**: Ethernet, CC-Link, Modbus TCP/IP
- **Features**: Data collection, supervision, alarm management
- **Integration**: Mitsubishi SCADA, third-party SCADA
- **Applications**: Supervisory control, data acquisition
- **Standards**: OPC UA, CC-Link standards

**MES Integration**
- **Protocols**: OPC UA, Web services, API
- **Features**: Production management, quality management
- **Integration**: Mitsubishi MES, third-party MES
- **Applications**: Manufacturing execution, production tracking
- **Standards**: ISA-95, OAGi, Web services

**ERP Integration**
- **Protocols**: Web services, REST API, SOAP
- **Features**: Data exchange, business process integration
- **Integration**: SAP integration, third-party ERP
- **Applications**: Enterprise resource planning, business integration
- **Standards**: OAGi, RosettaNet, Web services

#### 2. Network Integration
**CC-Link Network**
- **Protocols**: CC-Link, CC-Link IE Field, CC-Link IE Safety
- **Topology**: Bus, star, ring
- **Features**: High reliability, deterministic communication
- **Applications**: Industrial networking, device communication
- **Implementation**: CC-Link masters, CC-Link slaves, repeaters

**Ethernet Network**
- **Protocols**: Ethernet, TCP/IP, Modbus TCP/IP
- **Topology**: Star, ring, mesh
- **Features**: High reliability, redundancy, security
- **Applications**: Industrial networking, device communication
- **Implementation**: Ethernet switches, managed switches, redundant switches

**Wireless Network**
- **Protocols**: Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, proprietary wireless
- **Topology**: Point-to-point, point-to-multipoint
- **Features**: Mobility, flexibility, security
- **Applications**: Industrial wireless, remote monitoring
- **Implementation**: Wireless access points, wireless gateways

#### 3. Cloud Integration
**Mitsubishi Electric Cloud**
- **Type**: Cloud-based IoT platform
- **Features**: Device management, data processing, analytics
- **Communication**: Ethernet, CC-Link, Modbus TCP/IP
- **Integration**: Mitsubishi products, third-party systems
- **Applications**: Cloud-based monitoring, analytics, digital transformation

**Azure IoT**
- **Type**: Cloud IoT platform
- **Features**: Device management, data processing, analytics
- **Communication**: MQTT, AMQP, HTTP/HTTPS
- **Integration**: Mitsubishi products, Microsoft Azure
- **Applications**: Cloud-based monitoring, analytics, digital transformation

**AWS IoT**
- **Type**: Cloud IoT platform
- **Features**: Device management, data processing, analytics
- **Communication**: MQTT, HTTP/HTTPS, WebSockets
- **Integration**: Mitsubishi products, Amazon Web Services
- **Applications**: Cloud-based monitoring, analytics, digital transformation

### Security Features

#### 1. Network Security
**CC-Link Security**
- **Features**: CC-Link security, authentication, encryption
- **Integration**: Mitsubishi security products, third-party security
- **Applications**: Industrial network security, device security
- **Standards**: IEC 62443, NIST SP 800-82

**Ethernet Security**
- **Features**: Ethernet security, authentication, encryption
- **Integration**: Mitsubishi security products, third-party security
- **Applications**: Industrial network security, device security
- **Standards**: IEC 62443, NIST SP 800-82

**OPC UA Security**
- **Features**: OPC UA security, authentication, encryption
- **Integration**: Mitsubishi security products, third-party security
- **Applications**: Industrial communication security, data security
- **Standards**: IEC 62443, NIST SP 800-82, OPC UA security standards

#### 2. Device Security
**Access Control**
- **Features**: User authentication, role-based access control
- **Integration**: Mitsubishi security products, third-party security
- **Applications**: Device security, access control, user management
- **Standards**: IEC 62443, NIST SP 800-82

**Device Authentication**
- **Features**: Device authentication, certificate management
- **Integration**: Mitsubishi security products, third-party security
- **Applications**: Device security, authentication, trust management
- **Standards**: IEC 62443, NIST SP 800-82

**Device Encryption**
- **Features**: Data encryption, secure communication
- **Integration**: Mitsubishi security products, third-party security
- **Applications**: Data security, encryption, confidentiality
- **Standards**: IEC 62443, NIST SP 800-82

#### 3. Application Security
**Application Authentication**
- **Features**: Application authentication, user authentication
- **Integration**: Mitsubishi security products, third-party security
- **Applications**: Application security, access control, user management
- **Standards**: IEC 62443, NIST SP 800-82

**Application Encryption**
- **Features**: Data encryption, secure communication
- **Integration**: Mitsubishi security products, third-party security
- **Applications**: Data security, encryption, confidentiality
- **Standards**: IEC 62443, NIST SP 800-82

**Application Integrity**
- **Features**: Code signing, application integrity verification
- **Integration**: Mitsubishi security products, third-party security
- **Applications**: Application security, integrity verification, trust management
- **Standards**: IEC 62443, NIST SP 800-82
